comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Ahh yes - you're right - but each photograph is from a different series! One from NRS 17420 State Rail Authority Archives Photographic Reference Print Collection and the other from NRS12685 Sydney Harbour Bridge Photographic Albums.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: There is something a bit odd about the alignment of this photo.   In the background on the left is Farm Cove.   Sydney Cove on the right.  But if you actually go to Milson's Point,  it looks different.  Perhaps the foreshore was re-aligned.

comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: This wharf was immediately in front of what is now the north pylon of the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
